Question: Let's just make an album." The album won this person a Grammy Award as "Best Male Vocalist" for the song "Gotta Serve Somebody".
Hints: Much of Guthrie's repertoire was actually channeled through Elliott, and this person paid tribute to Elliott in Chronicles (2004).
On April 12, 2011, Legacy Recordings released this person in Concert – Brandeis University 1963.
On October 18, 2010, this person released Volume 9 of his Bootleg Series, The Witmark Demos.
